Reviews.Title: Bought this for our son.
Reviews.Author: Eileen Nies
Reviews.Content: Our son is a blossoming photography buff.  This has been a perfect upgrade from the point and shoot.  He loves it and has found it easy to use.  It takes great pictures.  We bought for all the accessories it comes with as well.  Great value!!

Reviews.Title: Great price and service
Reviews.Author: Eileen Johnson
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our office.  The sellers were very quick with shipping it out.  It arrived promptly and was packaged very well.  The camera is wonderful.  I would buy from Superfinds again in the future.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.2-megapixel DX-format imaging sensor for prints up to 20 x 30 inches
Includes Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G ED II AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor Autofocus Lens
1}Wide Angle Converter Lens 2} Telephoto Converter Lens 3} Full Size Lightweight Tripod 4}Deluxe Camera Bag 5}Wireless Remote
6} Multi-Coated 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD) 7}16 GB Class 10 Memory Card 8} Screen Protectors , Cleaning Cloth , Lens Cap Holder
ProductInfo.Name: New Nikon D3000 Digital SLR Camera Body with 3 Lens Kit : Nikon 18-55 mm Lens, Wide Angle, Telephoto, + Full Kit (Deluxe camera bag, 16gb Class 10 memory card, tripod, remote, filter, screen protectors, lens cap holder)
